infoCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoCollect.content: We collect personal information (name, email, billing details), usage data (IP address, browser type), and gym management data you enter into our system.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Data
howWeUse.content: We use your information to provide our services, process payments, communicate with you, improve our platform, and comply with legal obligations.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your data. We share information only with service providers (payment processors, hosting services), when required by law, or during business transfers.

security.title: Security & Retention
security.content: We protect your data using encryption, access controls, and regular security updates. Data is retained as needed for service provision and deleted within 90 days of account deletion.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or export your data. You can also restrict processing or withdraw consent at any time through your account settings.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, though some features may not work properly.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using FitFlow, you agree to these terms. You must be at least 18 years old and provide accurate information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining account security.

service.title: 2. Service Description
service.content: FitFlow is a gym management platform providing member management, payment processing, and operational tools. We may modify or discontinue features at any time.

billing.title: 3. Subscription & Billing
billing.content: Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually in advance. Your subscription automatically renews unless cancelled before the renewal date. We may change pricing with advance notice. Failed payments may result in service suspension.

cancellation.title: 4. Cancellation
cancellation.content: You can cancel anytime from your account settings. Access continues until the end of your billing period. See our Refund Policy for refund information.

yourData.title: 5. Your Data
yourData.content: You retain ownership of data you input. You grant us license to process it for service delivery. You're responsible for data accuracy, legality, and obtaining necessary member consents.

acceptableUse.title: 6. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: Do not use FitFlow for illegal activities, attempt unauthorized access, interfere with service operation, or violate others' rights. We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: FitFlow owns all software, designs, and content (excluding your data). You may not copy, modify, or distribute our service without permission.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: FitFlow is provided "as is" without warranties. We are not liable for indirect damages, data loss, or service interruptions. Our total liability is limited to amounts you paid in the past 12 months.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account for violations, non-payment, or at our discretion. Upon termination, your data may be deleted after a retention period.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance. Material changes will be communicated via email or service notification.

guarantee.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.content: New subscribers can request a full refund within 30 days of their first purchase. This guarantee applies once per customer and requires that you've made a good faith effort to use the service.

renewals.title: Subscription Renewals
renewals.content: Renewals are generally non-refundable. However, we may offer prorated refunds for accidental renewals within 7 days if you haven't used the service during the new billing period.

cancellations.title: Cancellations
cancellations.content: You can cancel your subscription anytime. You'll retain access until the end of your current billing period, but no refund will be issued for the remaining time.

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.content: Refunds are not available for: account terminations due to terms violations, requests made more than 60 days after purchase, or changes of mind after the guarantee period. We may offer service credits for technical issues or billing errors.

howToRequest.title: How to Request
howToRequest.content: Contact our support team through your account dashboard with your refund request. Include your order details and reason. Approved refunds are processed within 5-10 business days to your original payment method.

dataAfter.title: Data After Refund
dataAfter.content: Upon refund, your account access ends immediately. Your data is retained for 90 days in case you wish to resubscribe, then permanently deleted.
